Constructor Detail

TalkEvent

public TalkEvent(int id,
                 java.lang.Object source)
Constructs a new instance of the TalkEvent class specifying the event category with the ID and the object source which originated this event object.
Parameters:
ID - is an integer category description of the TalkEvent.
source:Ljava.lang.Object - is the object source, or originator, of this TalkEvent object.
